name: CreateSupportCase
description:
Create a new support case in Datadog.

Use this tool to create a new support case in Datadog. Useful for reporting issues or requesting assistance.

parameters.name: case_title
parameters.description: The title of the support case to be created. It should clearly summarize the issue or request.

parameters.name: case_type_uuid
parameters.description: UUID representing the case type. Provide a valid UUID to specify the type of case being created.

parameters.name: case_resource_type
parameters.description: Specifies the type of resource being created. Always use "case" for this argument.

parameters.name: case_description
parameters.description: A detailed description of the support case. Include all relevant information about the issue or request.

parameters.name: case_priority
parameters.description: The priority of the support case. Valid values are NOT_DEFINED, P1, P2, P3, P4, P5.

parameters.name: assignee_user_id
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the user assigned to the case. Typically a UUID string.

value_schema.description: A unique identifier that represents the user.

parameters.name: assignee_resource_type
parameters.description: The type of resource for the assignee, usually 'user'.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Provide the unique identifier of the project related to the support case.

value_schema.description: A unique identifier that represents the project

parameters.name: project_resource_type
parameters.description: Specifies the project resource type. Must be 'project'.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.name: data.relationships.assignee.data.id
parameters.description: A unique identifier that represents the user.

value_schema.description: A unique identifier that represents the user.

parameters.name: data.relationships.project.data.id
parameters.description: A unique identifier that represents the project

value_schema.description: A unique identifier that represents the project
